Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel For The Price!”
Reviews.Author: gordon61
Reviews.Content: Not luxurious, but very clean and comfortable. I had one small problem with a lamp that was fixed immediately. The woman at the front desk was extremely helpful when I checked in. Would certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Dog-friendly, budget comfort in downtown Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Susyn
Reviews.Content: I traveled to Daytona Beach at the beginning of March 2012 on business, accompanied by my dog. This requires that I find dog-friendly lodging. America's Best Value Inn was the closest dog-friendly motel in downtown Daytona Beach (not on the beach, or in the tourist areas, but downtown near the government and businesses). The rate was $36.00 per night and an additional $10 per night to have my dog. They don't do anything with the $10 pet fee, except allow you to bring your pet; no special cleaning occurs when you leave.The fee is high and unwarranted. The room, however, was worth the basic $36.00 per night. It had a king size bed, It had a compact fridge and a microwave on top of it. It had a desk with a 10/100 network cable to connect to free internet with. It had cable TV with HBO. The bathroom was recently redone. The problems with the room were that the outlet in the bathroom did not work (requiring me to blow dry my hair in the bedroom) and the shower curtain did not have magnets to secure it to the tub so when the shower is running (good water pressure, hot temps), the curtain billowed all over the place, spraying the entire kitchen sink and toilet and floor with tons of shower cast-off. I was there two nights, and I tried to pin down the curtain the second day, but ti is not really a shower curtain but the decorative curtain you see on showers that are meant to be lined with a plastic or vinyl liner. So water all over the bathroom was the norm. I had to take my dog to doggie day care every day while I attended to my business (read my review on the Pet Paradise Resort) on Trip Advisor, if you need a good doggie day care).because I was not allowed to leave her unattended in my room. I could have used that $10 extra they charged me to pay for doggie day care. I consider this stay to be par for the course for budget accommodations -- not top of the line, but not a dump. I was not unhappy with my stay; I just hate being charged unnecessarily for having a dog with me.

Reviews.Title: “WORST Experience of my life!”
Reviews.Author: kc7294
Reviews.Content: WORST Experience of my life! Hotel did not have my reservation. Had to threaten legal action to get a room that was the grossest place I've ever slept in!! Requested 2 beds only got 1. Not my fault your hotel messed up!!! Front desk clerk RUDE and a liar. AC didn't work. No hot water! No Carpet! Bugs on the floor! GROSS place!! Had reservation for 3 days only lasted 1 because it was so gross! I'd like to be refunded for the 2 days I did not use! Again.. NOT my fault that your system screwed up! I was almost out on the street in Daytona!

Reviews.Title: “Three night stay really was BEST VALUE!!”
Reviews.Author: WandaAnne
Reviews.Content: Our usual motel was already booked and this reservation happened to be the most economical deal in Daytona Beach so expectations were low but satisfaction really high. Whole motel recently remodeled and we stayed three nights. Staff most gracious and efficient giving us room not facing intersection at corner of motel. Motel also just far enough south of Daytona airport take-off and approach to minimize noise for sleeping. Bed was fantastic and with TV on minimum volume, noise from intersection and airport drowned out so we slept like a baby. Room had a big new TV with big cable package plus heating and cooling new and quiet. Impressed with housekeeping as room clean and stocked properly at arrival and throughout visit. Only negative is website said coffee available in office but none offered. Rates are thrifty enough you can bring a couple of coffee cups, a jar of instant java, add water, stick in microwave, and have as much coffee as you might desire. We know that for next time. Overall, we had a very pleasant stay and spent 1/4 the rate others at our meeting paid giving us that warm fuzzy feeling only a super deal can give. Yes, we'll stay again and are looking forward to it!!

Reviews.Title: “Very affordable but not compromise in quality”
Reviews.Author: Eifelyeti996
Reviews.Content: For less than $50 a night a king size bed. Normally you can see why it's this cheap by entering the room. I was very surprised seeing the room clean and in very good condition. Breakfast was not available.

Reviews.Title: “More Like Americas Worst Value , NEVER AGAIN”
Reviews.Author: nbbgirl901
Reviews.Content: I was on a road trip and we had to sleep somewhere. The only plcae that was open was here. I wasn't suprised. The room was complete filth and i was afraid to sleep under their sheets. Nobody was there. Like a complete ghost town

Reviews.Title: “Not a horror story like other reviews”
Reviews.Author: jgladieux
Reviews.Content: I arrived at the property which appeared to be an older motel, I did notice what appeared to be a new roof on it. I checked in promptly with a nice young man. I entered the room and found it to be small but nice and clean. The AC unit in the wall also appeared to be new and the filter was clean, I then checked out the bathroom and found it to be nice and clean with the only problems I saw was a burn mark on the edge of the tub and some small patch work in the walls. Overall I am very satisfied with my room and would not have a problem staying here in the future.

Reviews.Title: “No best value here!”
Reviews.Author: aeguy214
Reviews.Content: First off the location was horrible. And the customer service was less than acceptable. The room is very small and the floors were dirty. The drive to the beach was not bad but trying to get some sleep in this hotel is impossible on this road. There are several dive watering holes in the immediate area, what a plus that is!

Reviews.Title: “the last chance”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is the only place that we could find for the Daytona 500 (race weekend). I should of known better. If you like mold and filth, this is the place for you.
